contentList.content: *Say you're looking for a Phoenix, a flexible support focused on simultaneously buffing allies and debuffing enemies.
*Say you're looking for an Arsonist, a pyromaniac hell-bent on setting the battlefield ablaze.
*Say you're looking for a Scorcher, a gifted fire mage specialising in devastating damage-over-time effects.
*Say you're looking for an Infernal, a bulky hybrid damager with a penchant for pyrokinesis.
*Say you're looking for a Deathlord, a warrior beyond death who feasts on the life force of others.
*Say you're looking for a Bloodtide, a master of sanguimancy who sacrifices vitality to inflict pain onto others.
*Say you're looking for a Hexen, a witch armed with a plethora of powerful buffs and debuffs.
*Say you're looking for a Gravecaller, a necromancer able to raise the undead to do their bidding.
*Say you're looking for a Terramancer, a stone mage able to manipulate the fabric of the earth.
*Say you're looking for a Sentinel, an impenetrable warrior who is tough as steel.
*Say you're looking for a Grovetender, a preserver of nature who nourishes allies by commanding plant life.
*Say you're looking for a Plague, a wickedly-cruel poison mage excelling in deadly concoctions.
*Say you're looking for a Windweaver, a maestro of the winds who keeps their foes afar.
*Say you're looking for a Thunderlord, a warrior blessed with a lightning-charged hammer.
*Say you're looking for an Electromancer, a maniacal mage able to fork electricity across the battlefield.
*Say you're looking for a Tempest, a mage able to manipulate the atmosphere to conjure storms and cloud-based surfaces.
*Say you're looking for an Icevein, a cryomancer who keeps their foes frozen in place.
*Say you're looking for an Atlantean, a deep sea warrior armed with a water-infused trident.
*Say you're looking for a Tidecaller, a hydro mage gifted with the ability to manipulate the seas.
*Say you're looking for a Frostsworn, a frost paladin specialising in Magic Armour effects.
*Say you're looking for an Umbra, an assassin who switches between damage types to kill their mark.
*Say you're looking for a Spectre, a practioner of forbidden soul magic who blurs the line between life and death.
*Say you're looking for a Tracker, an expert hunter with a trusty Animal Companion by their side.
*Say you're looking for a Nightcloak, an assassin who dips in and out of visibility to unleash a flurry of deadly strikes.
*Say you're looking for a Constellationist.
*Say you're looking for an Astronomer.
*Say you're looking for a Beserker.
*Say you're looking for a Chronomancer.
*Say you're looking for a Trickster.
*Say you're looking for a Valkyrie.
*Say you're looking for a Mirage.
*Say you're looking for a Blacksmith.
*Say you're looking for a Wyldfae.
*Say you're looking for a Succubus.
*Say you're looking for a Vampire.
*Say you're looking for a Cryomancer.
*Say you're looking for a Priest.
